page.title: 09News in Dalgety Bay.
page.content: Dalgety Bay is well served by several local newspapers.The Fife Leader is one which is delivered free to each home every week.It carries local news,views, poems and competitions. Dalgety Bay has its own paper, the Dalgety Bay Diary which includes community information and news within the town. It is produced weekly and on the front cover there is always a piece of childrens artwork produced by children from the two local primary schools. The main local newspapers which people can buy are the Fife Free Press and the Dunfermline Press. The publishers of the Dunfermline Press produce a free supplement called the Fife and Kinross Extra which carries all of west Fife's classified ads.
